void QA_Init (  const char *  testName  ) 
 

Initialize QA system.

Parameters:
testName name of the test that will be printed in PASS/FAIL report

int QA_Term (  int  expectedSuccesses  ) 
 

Determine return code for program: 0 if OK, 1 if not the right number of successes, or 2 if error detected.

It is important to pass the expected number of success in case part of the test got skipped because of a silent error.

Parameters:
expectedSuccesses the expected value for the internal success counter
